title: Are MTG books useful for the IISER aptitude test? - Quora
tags: Indian Institute of Science Education and Research, Pune (IISER-P)

response.answer_text: Not really For IISER SCB test just concentrate on NCERT And maybe follow the pattern of previous SCB Tests along with JEE mains /NEET papers that should do the work But the most important thing is that you get all your concepts Crystal clear Since it is a a science institute they just check on your basic concepts
